scripts.folder:build: shx mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/bundle && shx cp -r src/** dist/
scripts.folder: npm run folder:clean -s && npm run folder:build -s
scripts.plugins:jquery: shx mkdir dist/js/jquery && shx cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* dist/js/jquery/
scripts.plugins:font-awesome: shx mkdir dist/css/font-awesome && shx cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css/ node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ dist/css/font-awesome/
scripts.plugins: npm run plugins:jquery -s && npm run plugins:font-awesome -s
scripts.js:uglifyjs: uglifyjs dist/js/app.js -m -o dist/js/app.min.js --in-source-map dist/js/app.js.map --source-map dist/js/app.min.js.map --source-map-url app.min.js.map --source-map-root app/js
scripts.js: npm run js:babel -s && npm run js:uglifyjs -s
scripts.dev: npm run folder -s && npm run plugins -s && npm run css -s && npm run js -s
scripts.prod:css: shx cat dist/bundle/tmp-fa.css dist/css/app.min.css | cleancss -o dist/bundle/bundle.min.css --s0
scripts.prod: npm run prod:css -s && npm run prod:js -s
scripts.build: npm run dev -s && npm run prod -s
